isis.stitle: INTERNATIONAL® VT 365 DIESEL ENGINE - CRANKCASE, CRANKSHAFT and BEARINGS, CAMSHAFT and BUSHINGS - Cleaning, Inspection, and Reconditioning - Crankshaft

svcproc.title: Crankshaft
svcproc.para: Clean and inspect the crankshaft and main bearings as follows:

step1.para: Clean crankshaft with a suitable solvent. Dry with compressed air.
Use a stiff nylon brush to clean all internal oil passages of crankshaft. Loosen all accumulated dirt, sludge, and deposits. Flush oil passages with a suitable solvent.
Inspect crankshaft journals (main and connecting rod) for scratches, grooves, and scoring.
Inspect crankshaft main bearings for scratches, grooves, scoring, pitting, and inconsistent coloring.
Use a 3-4 inch micrometer to measure the diameter of each journal (main and connecting rod). Measure each journal at two points 90° apart. Move micrometer over entire width of journal .

figure.caption: Figure 311. Measurement for crankshaft main journal
Figure 312. Measurement for crankshaft connecting rod journal

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, crankshaft must be reground or replaced if journals exceed maximum out-of-round or taper specifications.
